Curriculum Vitae

Work Experience

since 2016
Research Assistant, Saarland University, Saarbrücken, Germany
Phonetics and Phonology group at department of Language Science and Technology.
2015-2016
Research Assistant, Forschungszentrum Deutscher Sprachatlas, Marburg, Germany
Project: REDE – Regionalsprache.de
2014-2015
Teaching Assistant, Federal University of Rio Grande do Sul (UFRGS), Porto Alegre, Brazil
Joint scholarship program of the German Academic Exchange Service (DAAD) and the Brazilian Federal Agency for Support and Evaluation of Graduate Education (CAPES).
2010-2011
Foreign Language Assistant, Lycée Ronsard, Vendôme, France
Scholarship program of the PAD (Pädagogischer Austauschdienst) on behalf of the Ministers of Education and Culture of the Federal States, Germany.
